item.title: American Music
item.description: Amiri Baraka said it best: “One of the most baffling things about America is that despite its essentially vile profile, so much beauty continues to exist here. Perhaps it’s as so many thinkers have said, that it is because of the vileness, or call it adversity, that such beauty does exist. (As balance?)”. American music is black music. Listen, feel, and understand.
